item.title: The craziest Prime Day Apple deals are still live. Here's what to shop
item.description: Still thinking about pulling the trigger on a new pair of Apple AirPods? I'm here to tell you that you should not wait much longer. The2025 Amazon Prime Day sale endstonight, July 11and the best deals are sure to disappear.

item.title: Get free AirPods with Apple‚Äôs 2025 student discount üçé
item.description: Back-to-school season just got a major tech upgrade. Apple has officially launched its2025 back-to-school sale, and it is packed with freebies for college students, parents and educators looking to invest in new tech before the the bell rings on the fall semester.

item.description: The Herald-Tribune has gone back and documented the fast-pitch softball teams that have won state championships.

item.title: Looking back at Sarasota, Manatee's all-time state‚Ä¶
item.description: Since the Florida High School Athletic Association started holding baseball state championships in 1922, Sarasota/Manatee counties have racked up 25 titles, the first dating back to 1925.

item.title: Top 5 concerts this week in Sarasota, Manatee counties
item.description: Like many weeksin Julyandthe Sarasota area's off-season, this week's concert picks largely consist of talented musicians who call Florida home. However, we do kick things off with a reggae musician from California, who visits the area while on tour with a group from Maryland.

item.title: Venice Theatre brings back SummerStock after two-year hiatus
item.description: After a two-year hiatus caused by damage from Hurricane Ian in 2023, Venice Theatre has brought back its SummerStock program, which this year will culminate with the Tony Award-winning musical ‚ÄúThe 25th Annual Putnam County Spelling Bee.‚Äù
